benefitsSlider.title: Free to Join. Easy to use.
benefitsSlider.description: Discover a hassle-free way to grow your business. With free signup and an easy-to-use platform.

benefits.name: Steady Work
benefits.description: Enjoy a steady flow of job opportunities—no client searching needed.

benefits.name: Direct Connections
benefits.description: Communicate easily with homeowners to ask questions and build trust.

benefits.name: Build Your Reputation
benefits.description: Earn positive reviews to build credibility and attract more clients.

benefits.name: Easy Job Matching
benefits.description: Get matched with projects that align with your skills and schedule

benefits.name: Save on Advertising
benefits.description: We promote your services at no extra cost.

benefits.name: Expand Your Network
benefits.description: Connect with homeowners and professionals to unlock new opportunities.

hero.title: Get discovered by local customers seeking
hero.description: Join our platform to connect with homeowners, find projects that match your skills, and grow your business—all while staying in control.

howTo.title: How it works
howTo.description: Getting started is easy! In just three simple steps, you'll connect with homeowners, find projects that match your skills, and grow your business—all while staying in control.

stepOne.title: Step 1: Create Your Profile
stepOne.description: Sign up and create your professional profile. Add your skills, experience, and service areas to showcase your expertise to potential clients.

stepTwo.title: Step 2: Browse Opportunities
stepTwo.description: Our system connects you with tailored opportunities based on your profile. Browse detailed requests and choose projects that fit your business.

stepThree.title: Step 3: Connect and Grow
stepThree.description: Communicate directly with clients, manage your schedule, and grow your business. Our platform helps you focus on what you do best.

cookieConsent.message: TryMyGuys.com doesn't use third party cookies - only a single in-house cookie.
cookieConsent.noThirdParty: No data is sent to a third party.

hero.description: Join our network of trusted pros, find local jobs, and grow your business on your terms.

scheduling.title: Get the work
scheduling.description: TryMyGuys connects trusted tradespeople with local jobs in minutes. View details, browse photos, and screen customers to accept jobs confidently.
